programme.title: Live: WWE Friday Night SmackDown
programme.desc: The Superstars of World Wrestling Entertainment display their skills and athleticism in weekly episodic programming, as scores are settled and enduring rivalries play out in the ring.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: Fresh out of law school, Rudy Baylor confronts Leo F. Drummond in a medical malpractice case.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: A look inside Episode 1 of USA's The Rainmaker.

The 118 and Tommy are presented with the Medal of Valor for their work on the cruise ship rescue; Hen and Karen encounter an unforeseen hurdle in their foster care journey; Eddie's emotional affair develops further.

Following the devastating fire at the Nash home, Bobby's fate remains uncertain; Athena embarks on a mission to uncover the truth; Hen and Karin engage in a heated custody battle; Christopher grapples with forgiving Eddie.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: Fresh out of law school, Rudy Baylor confronts Leo F. Drummond in a medical malpractice case.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: The case of Johnny Hincapie, whose conviction for the 1990 murder of a Utah tourist in New York -- a case that represented a tipping point in the city's law enforcement -- was overturned after 25 years.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: After a young Army veteran disappears, detectives uncover a cryptic 911 call placed 11 days before she went missing, which exposes a twisted story -- and the truth.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A wife and mother survives an attack in her home and a shot to the head; authorities search for a motive.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A wife and mother survives an attack in her home and a shot to the head; authorities search for a motive.

When the Hollywood Reservoir dam breaks, Bobby and the 118 race into action to save passengers on a city bus that has crashed into a building several stories in the air; the team adjusts to life as first responders during the pandemic.

programme.desc: Stateside Premier League fan festival that includes a turf pitch, the Premier League trophy, club mascots, special guests, contests, and more.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Aston Villa host Newcastle United. In 2024-25, both clubs finished level on 66 points, with Newcastle earning the fifth and final UEFA Champions League spot on goal differential. Villa thrashed Newcastle 4-1 during the last meeting in Birmingham.

In the aftermath of the dam break, massive mudslides wreak havoc throughout Los Angeles; Athena fights to save herself and an agoraphobic woman after her house collapses; a group of pregnant women trapped in a submerged house.

The team races to save a man under siege by his high-tech smart home; a yoga teacher loses her vision; Athena hunts down a bank robber disguised by COVID-19 protocols; members of the 118's crew prepare for an out-of-state mission.

Athena investigates a mysterious murder during a neighborhood block party; the 118 rush to save lives endangered by a bomb threat; Chimney has a hard time keeping secrets when Maddie and Buck's parents come to town.
The 118 races to save the lives of workers trapped in a factory fire; Maddie reveals a painful family secret that causes Buck to confront his childhood and answer why he is the daredevil he is today.

The 118 has a day from hell with a never-ending series of bizarre emergency calls; a man tapes himself to a freeway billboard; a restaurant manager destroys his own business; Eddie feels a spark with Christopher's former teacher.

programme.desc: Pre-race show with analysis, driver profiles, reports from the garage, interviews with drivers and crew chiefs, and more.

programme.desc: The NASCAR Cup Series season rolls on with the Cook Out 400. Shane van Gisbergen ran his road-course win streak to four races Aug. 10 in New York, and joined Dan Gurney as the only drivers to collect their first five career victories on road courses.

A man gets pinned under a Humvee; a garage band rocks out too hard; Michael notices strange behavior at a nearby apartment; Hen's mother unexpectedly arrives and announces she is moving to Los Angeles.
The 118 are called to the tarmac when a flight attendant reaches her limit with her flight's passengers; Eddie worries Christopher will not accept him dating; Buck reconnects with an old flame.

Athena and the 118 race to save lives after a drunken driver causes a deadly pileup on the freeway; Maddie goes into labor; Hen and Karen are devastated as they prepare their foster daughter to be reunited with her birth mother.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler have to get creative when a rape victim's father refuses to help the detectives get the information they need to solve a case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman finds a teenage boy sleeping naked in her bedroom, detectives Benson and Stabler investigate the teen and his mother to find out what really happened.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler believe a fellow cop may be behind murders going back 30 years; Munch is in rare form during a child molestation case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler investigate the shooting death of a sleazy judge who abused the criminal-justice system.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a baby is kidnapped from a grocery store, detectives Benson and Stabler discover it is part of a black-marketing of infants.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler investigate the case of a woman (Cynthia Nixon) with multiple personalities who may have abused and killed her daughter; the detectives must adjust to sweeping changes in the SVU.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives are called to investigate when a hotel maid reports being assaulted by a powerful Italian diplomat.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the detectives investigate the sexual assault of the executive of a private military-contract company, they discover a larger conspiracy in Iraq.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation of a congressman falsely accused of soliciting underage girls leads the SVU to a sex trafficking ring; Benson and Rollins are the targets of a salacious website.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The female CEO of a popular wellness company says she was raped, but her business partner claims the accusation is part of an embezzlement cover-up.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: While Fin and Phoebe make wedding plans, Benson and Rollins try to help a homeless single mother who's being trafficked in exchange for safe housing.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: When Arne Slot guided Liverpool to their 20th League title in his debut season, it marked the beginning of a new era, yet echoed a familiar tradition. programme.title: Hard Knocks
programme.desc: Mitchell Trubisky and Mike White continue their tussle to be back-up quarterback to Josh Allen. And, head coach Sean McDermott opens up about his battle with skin cancer.

programme.title: Premier League Preview
programme.desc: A look ahead to the opening weekend of the 2025/26 Premier League season, including Aston Villa v Newcastle, Liverpool v Bournemouth and Man United v Arsenal.

programme.title: Premier League: The Big Interview
programme.desc: Sean Longstaff discusses his near decade spell at Newcastle United, winning the EFL Cup with his boyhood club, and his decision to take on an exciting new project at Leeds United.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: When Arne Slot guided Liverpool to their 20th League title in his debut season, it marked the beginning of a new era, yet echoed a familiar tradition. Explore the rich legacy of Liverpool's managerial transitions, where through decades of change, one constant endures: the club's remarkable ability to evolve and triumph, through seamless succession.

programme.title: Fight Week
programme.desc: A preview of UFC 319 at the United Center in Chicago. Middleweight champion Dricus du Plessis will defend his title against Khamzat Chimaev in the main event.
